entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
